import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-orders', templateUrl: './my-orders.component.html', styleUrls: ['./my-orders.component.scss'] }) export class MyOrdersComponent implements OnInit { myOrderList:any; constructor(private userSer:UsersService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.myOrder(); } myOrder(){ let user:any = localStorage.getItem("user"); let userId = user && JSON.parse(user).data.id; if(userId){ this.userSer.getMyOrders(userId).subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.myOrderList = res.data console.log( this.myOrderList ,"resss"); }) }else{ let localMyOrders = localStorage.getItem("MyItems"); let myOrder = l } } cancelOrder(id:any){ console.log(id,"iddddd"); } }
